pageContext.description: square section with rounded angles. Socket damaged
pageContext.other: I do not think this card can be completed as it stands because the location does not make sense. I entered 'West Halton' in the geolocator and got a location near Scunthorpe in Lincolnshire NOT Humberside as stated. All the evidence (collection, date) suggest it was found in Sproatley along with the other 9 implements from the Greenwell collection! I wrote that before I noticed that the number has now risen to 18! IF we are dealing with the same hoard......
pageContext.associations: Part of a hoard of 18 socketed axes, scrap metal or casting jet
pageContext.collection: British Museum WG 2130,  Given by J Pierpoint Morgan Esq 1909,  Greenwell collection
